section.title: sales taxable summarized Summarized Taxable Sales
section.para: The Summarized Taxable Sales display enables you to determine the amount of sales Tax you have billed over a given period of time. To view a summary of taxable sales, select the "Summarized Taxable Sales" option from the "Displays" menu. The following screen will appear:
When displaying summarized taxable sales, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display summarized taxable Sales for all Tax Codes.
Specify Tax Code whose summarized taxable Sales you want to display.
Taxable sales transactions occurring on or after this date will display.
Taxable sales transactions occurring on or before this date will display.
Display lists summarized sales using the specified parameters.
